mapper.select: SELECT COMPANYNAME, COMPANYIMG, DETAILEDIMG, ANNOUNCEMENT, REPNUMBER, DAYOFF, BREAKTIME, COMPANY_ADDRESS AS COMPANYADDRESS FROM COMPANYADDINFO, COMPANY ORDER BY COMPANYNAME ASC
SELECT c.*, ci.COMPANYIMG, ci.DETAILEDIMG, ci.ANNOUNCEMENT, ci.REPNUMBER, ci.DAYOFF, ci.BREAKTIME FROM COMPANY c LEFT JOIN COMPANYADDINFO ci on c.COMPANY_NAME = ci.COMPANYNAME
